CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Discontinued", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "Requirement Not Met - Patient Residency","Patient does not reside in the United States or territories", "Unable to reach Patient on required contact, Max Attempts","Maximum attempts exhausted for contacting patient", "Unable to reach Prescriber on required contact, Max Attempts","Maximum attempts exhausted for contacting prescriber", "Patient Decision - Alternate Therapy","Patient on alternate treatment therapy", "Patient Decision - Financial","Patient unable to afford out of pocket expense", "Patient Decision - MyRare Only","Patient has opted out of patient support services, but still on treatment", "Patient Decision - Other","Patient unwilling to started treatment, other", "Prescriber Decision - Alternate Therapy","Patient on alternate treatment therapy", "Prescriber Decision - Financial","Patient unable to afford out of pocket expense", "Prescriber Decision - Coverage Effort","", "Prescriber Decision - Other","Patient unwilling to started treatment, other", "Patient Medical Delay, Max Delay","Hospitalization, LTC, and other medical reason a patient could not start treatment", "No Route of Access","Appeal options exhausted and over criteria for PAP", "Patient Deceased","Patient deceased", "Patient Off Therapy","Patient no longer in therapy", "Other","Other", "Reported Reaction","Patient Stopped therapy due to reported Reaction", "Clinical Trial","Patient is entering a clinical trial for a different medication", "Administration Barrier","Patient refused treatment, could not locate vein access to infuse patient", "No coverage: Appeals exhausted and PAP ineligible","Replaces No Route of Access sub status - Appeal options exhausted and over income criteria for PAP", null), null)
CustomField.label: Status Description - Discontinued
